info.title: ZeyOS REST API (Swagger)
info.description: This endpoint lets you list, create, delete and update weblets. If you want to learn more about queries and data filters, read our documentation at http://docs.zeyos.apiary.io/#introduction/sql-via-rest and http://docs.zeyos.apiary.io/reference/weblets
